column2: あなたの運を試験して！
オレンジ色フィールドに行って。もう所有者がいたら、レントを支払う。所有者がいなければ、無料でフィールドをもらって。
Give this card to the Ufo. On their next turn they can move to an unowned field and get it for free. If no unowned fields exist, buy one from another player.
オレンジ色フィールドに行って。もう所有者がいたら、レントを支払う。所有者がいなければ、無料でフィールドをもらって。
Give this card to the Race car. On their next turn they can  move to an unowned field and get it for free. If no unowned fields exist, buy one from another player.
You ate too much candy give the bank 2$
オレンジ色か緑色フィールドに行って。もう所有者がいたら、レントを支払う。所有者がいなければ、無料でフィールドをもらって。
Move to a blue field, if it's unowned get it for free, if not you pay rent
You got a "get out of jail free card" Use it when you get jailed.
Give this card to the Car. On their next turn they can  move to an unowned field and get it for free. If no unowned fields exist, buy one from another player.
Give this card to the Tractor. On their next turn they can  move to an unowned field and get it for free. If no unowned fields exist, buy one from another player.
It's your birthday get 1$ from everyone
Move to a pink or dark blue field, if it's unowned get it for free, if not you pay rent
You did all your homework get 2$ from the bank
赤いフィールドに行って。もう所有者がいたら、レントを支払う。所有者がいなければ、無料でフィールドをもらって。
Move to "Skatepark" If it's unowned get it for free, if not pay rent
赤いか青いフィールドに行って。もう所有者がいたら、レントを支払う。所有者がいなければ、無料でフィールドをもらって。
Move to a brown or yellow field, if it's unowned get it for free, if not you pay rent
何人がゲームをしたいか？
プレーヤーは多すぎか少しすぎ
名前がもう使用したから、別の名前を選んで！
Because all colors are owned, the rent was doubled!
Do you want to restart the game?
